post.body: Thanks for the follow! Fremont's a nice town!!
Thanks for the follow!
Thanks for the follow. I used to live in Lincoln!!
Yes it does
I bet there are ways you could thrive - to do more than just survive!
That's the spirit! You do have real friends out there who love you for you, even if family cant
IT is hard sometimes. I finally decided I can follow my ambitions better w/o them than with. They're too limiting in what can be
Would be easier if Mom agreed and left me alone, but no, she keeps dragging me back in. That's, ok, I have an ace left to play.
looks like a similar boat! I refuse to let mine win. I'm stronger than that.
I refuse the abuse, and then get more heaped on me. NICE! But it's been motivating reason to get things going. Happy New Years all
That I WANT TO permanently leave it. She created the issue, wants to have her cake and eat it too. Not happening, Mom.
HOw's this for hard: my siblings told me this year they don't want ME in the family. MOM condones that, then wonders why I say
Lack of challenge is the worst thing a person can face. You get to choose if a thing is good or bad. YOur life, your choice.
You can't let others tell you how your life is going to be. They can make it challenging, but a challenge isn't the worst thing.
giving out advice I should be taking.. whaddya know!
Yeah, same here. I'm making things better, and not just for me. Have to find upside - and stop listening/watching the news!!
Good Morning tweets! Thanks, @crumcake - I needed a good kick in the pants!
RT @SierraRanch Something we were withholding made us weak, until we found it was ourselves. - Robert Frost
Giving away free audio dressage riding lessons... http://Free-Horse-Gifts.com
Giving away a free special report on colic http://Free-Horse-Gifts.com
